descriptions: ['DescriptionKnight Frank is proud to present this beautifully maintained Gallery View Signature Villa on Palm Jumeirah. Located high on The Frond, this is a rare opportunity for the discerning family.\nThe Gallery View is the most popular layout, affording ground floor open plan living and maximising the views from all family rooms of the open water and Atlantis. The ground floor comprises of a large open extended family area, second family room, formal dining, kitchen, laundry and staff rooms. Also located on the lower level, are two double en suite bedrooms a cloakroom and guest bathroom. An elegant staircase rises to a mezzanine floor where you will find two large double en suite bedrooms. The stairs continue to the full open galleried landing with balcony views to the lower floors. From this central area of the first floor, you will be greeted by a large bedroom with views of the beach, a large ensuite bathroom . At the other end of the large open gallery area you will find  the entrance to the master suite with walk in closet and large bathroom. To the rear of the property lie the mature gardens, large swimming pool, entertaining area with seating and private beach with beautiful views and open waters.\nTo view this amazing home please contact Knight Frank at your earliest convenience.']

descriptions:
['DescriptionOne of the very few larger studios available in Club Vista Mare. These units are unique and very sought after. Tastefully furnished  this studio apartment is located directly on  the beach with sea views and views of the Burj Al Arab. Perfect investment opportunity or as a lock and go holiday retreat.
	 * Fully furnished
	 * Fully fitted kitchen 
	 * Large Terrace overlooking the sea
	 * Spacious Lounge
	 * Large Entertaining Terrace
	 * Modern Bathroom
	 * Own private car park space
	 * Ample Restaurants
	 * Only beach front studio on the Palm
Club Vista Mare, a new beachfront residential and recreation project on Dubais Palm Jumeirah.  The project includes 33 studio apartments with eight cafes and restaurants, retail areas and gymnasium facilities, all with spectacular views of Palm Jumeirahs eastern shoreline and Dubais world-famous landmarks.
The contemporary-style Club Vista Mare complex will span almost 5000 sq.m. at ground level, with an additional 2740 sq.m of residential space on the first floor.  Each studio covers almost 50 sq.m and comes with its own private terrace with panoramic views of the Arabian Gulf, Palm Jumeirah and Dubais skyline. It is unique in its design, yet will naturally blend in with and complement the islands existing developments.']
